name: hydrochloride
hydrochlorides
FoodContactSubstance:
Poly(N-vinylformamide), 10-90 percent hydrolyzed hydrochloride salts. The FCS is specifically known as one of the following:
a) formamide, N-ethenyl-, polymer with ethanamine, hydrochloride (CAS Reg. No. 111616-55-8) or
b) formamide, ethenyl-, homopolymer, hydrolyzed, hydrochlorides (CAS Reg. No. 183815-54-5).
